author: www.yunnan.cn,云南日报报业集团,云南网
title: 爆料：美国秘密在芯片货物中安了追踪器_国际_新闻频道_云南网
text:
原标题：爆料：美国秘密在芯片货物中安了追踪器
据环球时报8月13日消息，最近，国家网信办就美国英伟达算力芯片漏洞后门安全风险约谈该公司问题受到关注。与此同时，越来越多美国给芯片安“后门”的内幕也被曝光。
8月13日，路透社又刊发独家报道爆料，美国秘密在人工智能相关芯片中设置追踪器，以发现“芯片被转运至中国的情况”。
路透社报道截图
报道称，据两位知情人士透露，美国政府已秘密在他们认为有可能被转运至中国的先进芯片目标货物中植入位置追踪装置。知情人士称，这些措施“仅适用于部分受调查的货件”。追踪器可为美方搜集个人或机构违反出口管制的信息。
位置追踪器是美国执法机构数十年来一直使用的一种调查工具，用于追踪受出口限制的产品，例如飞机零部件。
另外五名人工智能服务器供应链相关人士表示，他们知道戴尔和超微 （Super Micro）的服务器货物中使用了这些追踪器，这些服务器中包含英伟达和AMD公司的芯片。这些人表示，追踪器通常隐藏在服务器的产品包装中。
两名参与服务器供应链的人士描述，2024年的一个案例中，一批搭载英伟达芯片的戴尔服务器不仅运输箱上装有大型追踪器，还在包装内甚至服务器内部隐藏了更小、更隐蔽的追踪装置。
消息人士称，负责监督出口管制和执法的美国商务部工业与安全局通常参与这类行动中，另外联邦调查局（FBI）等部门也可能参与其中。
对于美国限制对华出口先进人工智能芯片相关问题，中国外交部发言人林剑11日表示，中方反对将科技和经贸问题政治化、工具化、武器化，反对对中国进行恶意封锁和打压的立场是一贯、明确的。这种做法扰乱全球产供链稳定，不符合任何一方利益。

author: mobile@rds.ca ()
title: Spengler : Le Canada trébuche contre le HC Davos
text:
[Passer au contenu principal](#main)
Coupe Spengler : Le Canada s'effondre en troisième période contre le HC Davos
Le Canada pensait bien se diriger vers une deuxième victoire à la Coupe Spengler, mais le HC Davos a trouvé le fond du filet trois fois en troisième période pour filer vers un triomphe de 4-3 jeudi après-midi.
Après avoir créé l'égalité 3-3 grâce à un filet de Andres Ambühl en milieu de période, le HC Davos a pris les devants avec moins de quatre minutes à jouer en troisième période lorsque Calle Andersson a marqué de l'enclave malgré la couverture canadienne.
Michael Fora avait précédemment réduit l'écart à 3-2 pour le HC Davos dans les premiers instants du troisième vingt. Le HC Davos n'a jamais eu les commandes dans le match avant que Andersson ne place les siens en avance en fin de match.
Le Canada a bourdonné dangereusement lors d'un avantage numérique dans les deux dernières minutes de jeu de la troisième période, mais le gardien Gilles Senn a résisté aux Canadiens pour préserver l'avance du HC Davos.
John Quenneville, Michael Joly et Josh Jooris ont été les marqueurs pour le Canada. Quenneville et Joly ont marqué en fin de deuxième période pour porter le pointage à 3-1.
En raison de ce revers, le Canada échappe le laissez-passer vers la demi-finale du tournoi. Le Canada devra affronter le KalPa Kuopio vendredi, dans l'espoir de rejoindre le HC Dynamo Pardubice en demi-finale samedi.

author: Auteurs Propriétaire du blog
title: LES BENEDICTINES DE VANVES ONT CELEBREES LA DEDIDACE DE LEUR PRIEURE SAINTE BATHILDE - vanvesauquotidien
text: Les sœurs bénédictines de vanves ont célébré mardi dernier les 75 ans de la Dédicace de leur monastère et surtout de la chapelle Saint Bathilde. Ainsi, un 28 Mai 1949, leur église a été consacrée par le nonce apostolique Mgr Roncalli, futur pape Jean XXIII. Elles étaient à l’époque prés de 75 ans et disposaient de leur premier véritable monastère construit entre 1934-36 par les fréres Perret et le moine architecte Don Paul Bellot (1876-1944) qui a véritablement créé un bâtiment d‘avant-garde avec la brique de Vaugirard, une chapelle à nef unique avec une charpente métallique, une toiture en fibro-cimet, un campanile à 3 cloches, un cloître fermé. Le prieuré avait été inauguré par le cardinal Verdier le 25 Mars 1936 et la chapelle a été consacrée le 28 Mai 1949 par le futur pape dont une plaque apposée à gauche de l’entrée rappelle le souvenir ainsi que les traces des doigts du futur pape sur les croix de consécration apposées dans l’édifice. Mgr Angelo Roncalli, avait été appelé en urgence par la supérieure de sa communauté des bénédictines de Vanves, Sœur Martin, 95ans, au caractère très trempé, pour consacrer l'église du Christ-Rédempteur. Le futur Jean XXIII avait alors accepté de remplacer au pied levé le cardinal Emmanuel Suhard, archevêque de Paris, mourant. « Mon métier préféré, c'est d'être bouche-trous », répondait alors le diplomate, trop content de s'échapper d'une nonciature où il étouffait. D’ailleurs il est intéressant de constater que l’un de ses lointains successeurs actuels, Mgr Celestino Migliore, vient souvent célébrer chez les sœurs des moments importants comme ce fut le cas à Noël, à Pâques, où il a partagé un repas amical le dimanche Pascal avec les sœurs et des fidèles de la messe dominicale chez les Soeurs Bénédictines. Un homme d’église charmant, affable, qui a été Nonce en Pologne, en Russie, aprés avoir été observateur à l'ONU du Vatican.

author: Caio Miari
title: Barkley 'super excited' about Eagles culture, fans | theScore.com
text: Barkley 'super excited' about Eagles culture, fans Saquon Barkley praised the Philadelphia Eagles culture and what the franchise is building during his introductory press conference with the team on Thursday. "When it came to my attention that the Eagles were a team that were interested in me, I definitely got excited about it," Barkley said, according to [SNY](https://twitter.com/SNYGiants/status/1768358466144403573). " ... From watching from afar, everything that they're about, the culture here, the fans here, definitely got super excited about it, and I'm just happy to be a part of this organization." Barkley signed a three-year contract with Philadelphia in a surprise move on Monday following six seasons with one of the Eagles' biggest rivals, the New York Giants. The star tailback hit free agency after playing 2023 on a one-year contract. New York reportedly didn't offer him a new contract this offseason. The 2018 No. 2 pick has been one of the NFL's premier running backs when healthy. A two-time Pro Bowler, Barkley amassed 7,311 scrimmage yards and 47 total touchdowns in New York. The former Offensive Rookie of the Year topped the 2,000-yard mark during his freshman season in the league but has since battled multiple injuries and played just one full season since 2019. Despite missing three games in 2023, Barkley accounted for 1,242 yards and 10 touchdowns. He expects to have a big impact in Philly, too. "I feel like I'm a special player," Barkley said, according to [Dave Zangaro of NBC Sports Philadelphia](https://twitter.com/DZangaroNBCS/status/1768377298045030568). "I feel like I still got a lot left and I got a lot to prove. I just can't wait to get on the field with those guys and prove it and show it to the world." The Eagles began last season with a 10-1 record but weren't able to replicate that success in the final stretch and ultimately fell short against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in the wild-card round. "I know everyone is stuck on last year being 11-6 and making it to the first round (of the postseason) and that's a down year," Barkley said, per team reporter [Chris McPherson](https://www.philadelphiaeagles.com/news/saquon-barkley-eagles-ive-got-a-lot-to-prove). "That's a great culture to be a part of, when you have that mindset."

author: Greener Ideal Staff
title: How Driveaway Services Contribute to Eco-Friendly Transportation | Greener Ideal
text: Plenty of people need to transport a vehicle across the country, and yet traditional shipping methods rack up emissions in a way that’s antithetical to the modern sustainability movement. Thankfully, driveaway services offer an eco-friendly alternative to the old-school way of doing things. It’s a more direct, efficient approach in almost every way. So if you’ve never encountered it as an option before, hold tight and we’ll explain why it’s so environmentally advantageous. Reducing Carbon Footprints First of all, driveaway services stand out as a green option because they cut down on the typical carbon footprint that’s associated with heavy-duty vehicle haulers and container shipping. It works because: - Fewer trucks running means less emissions. - Direct driving avoids detours that increase fuel consumption. - It often involves driving vehicles which have a better gas mileage compared to large haulers. There are even [driveaway services](https://wideloadshipping.com/trucking/driveaway/) which focus on commercial vehicles such as trucks and trailers. So if you’ve got to move one of these locally or nationally, having someone drive it directly to its destination is equally sustainable. There are a few other reasons that this is helpful, convenient and pro-planet. For instance, there’s no need for excessive packaging or loading machinery typically required in traditional transport methods. The fewer moving parts involved in transporting a vehicle, the lower the environmental impact. In short, switching gears to sustainable options doesn’t have to be complex. In fact it can be eminently straightforward while still being effective. Integrating Renewable Energy in Driveaway Operations As [renewable energy](https://greenerideal.com/guides/renewable-energy/) tech matures, it creates exciting possibilities for driveaway services. These companies can increasingly tap into sustainable power sources to make transportation even greener. For instance: - Electric vehicles (EVs) are on the rise in driveaway fleets. [Solar-powered EV charging stations can support these vehicles](https://greenerideal.com/guides/use-solar-panels-on-your-garage-to-recharge-electric-car/)en route.- Some services use biodiesel for conventional engines, reducing emissions. This shift isn’t just theoretical. Many forward-thinking firms have already begun implementing solar panels and wind turbines at their hubs to charge up EVs before trips. This aligns with the trend of decentralizing power generation, which boosts both eco-friendliness and efficiency. You might also notice more hybrids being driven by these services soon enough. While they still need gas sometimes, they offer greater fuel efficiency than older models while embracing some aspects of electrification that reduce emissions during longer journeys to get to your location. The Role of Technology in Enhancing Eco-Friendly Transport Driveaway services are leveraging a number of other cutting-edge solutions to boost sustainability, most of which we’ve not touched on yet. Digital innovations in particular play a crucial part in refining eco-friendly transport. For example: - Route optimization software cuts unnecessary mileage. - Telematics track vehicle performance and energy use. - Real-time monitoring ensures [efficient driving habits](https://greenerideal.com/guides/5-simple-changes-driving-habits-can-save-money-environment/). As these tools continue improving, expect more precise strategies for reducing environmental impact while providers are also maintaining top-notch service quality. Impact of Regulation on Sustainable Vehicle Shipping The government is in the process of working towards the complete decarbonisation of transport, which is planned to be achieved [by 2050](https://www.energy.gov/eere/sustainable-transportation-and-fuels). This is leading to a growing number of strict regulations that influence all sorts of transportation operations, including those that relate to shipping vehicles. As time passes, expect to see: - Emission standards which necessitate cleaner vehicle fleets. - Incentives which encourage the [adoption of eco-friendly practices](https://greenerideal.com/news/business/sustainable-business-practices-every-company-should-adopt/). - Stricter compliance monitoring which keeps everyone accountable. The introduction of more stringent emissions limits means that fleet operators need to adapt by incorporating greener vehicles. This transformation is accelerated through incentives like tax breaks for using low-emission or electric vehicles. In turn it could mean that there’s greater demand for driveaway services, since other methods might become effectively outlawed. As part of this, regular audits will be required to check that businesses are adhering to these new standards, promoting accountability within every industry. Potential Challenges and Solutions for Greener Transportation Even with promising advances, eco-friendly driveaway services face hurdles. Tackling these obstacles is crucial to achieving widespread [sustainability in vehicle transport](https://greenerideal.com/news/vehicles/hydrogen-cars-sustainable-transportation/). For instance: - Limited EV infrastructure can impede progress. - Upfront costs of green tech pose financial barriers. - Driver training requires updates for optimal results. The shortage of charging stations across routes hinders full EV adoption. One way around this is building partnerships between companies and local governments to expand essential infrastructure quickly. Though high initial [investment in green technology](https://greenerideal.com/guides/green-investing/) deters some operators, grants or subsidies help alleviate the financial burden. By offering economic support, companies can more easily transition to environmentally conscious operations without compromising their bottom line. Training drivers on efficient driving techniques remains vital for maximizing benefits from sustainable practices. Implementing comprehensive programs ensures that staff can get a handle on greener methods without burning out. Wrapping Up Put simply, driveaway services are the solution to the vehicle transportation problems of individual car owners and business fleet operators alike. While they are not the most eco-friendly option in every scenario, for a lot of cases they can be cleaner and greener than anything else.

author: Paige Austin
title: Ocean Water Advisory Issued For LA County Beaches
